Barbarian.description: A fierce warrior of primitive background who can enter a battle rage
Barbarian.Armor and Weapon Proficiencies: Light and medium armor, shields, simple and martial weapons
Barbarian.Equipment: a greataxe or any martial melee weapon, two handaxes or any simple weapon, An explorer’s pack and four javelins
Barbarian.skills: 2, Animal Handling, Athletics, Intimidation, Nature, Perception, Survival

Bard.description: An inspiring magician whose power echoes the music of creation
Bard.Armor and Weapon Proficiencies: Light armor, simple weapons, hand crossbows, longswords, rapiers, shortswords
Bard.Equipment: a rapier or a longsword or any simple weapon, a diplomat’s pack or an entertainer’s pack, a lute or any other musical instrument, Leather armor and a dagger

Cleric.description: A priestly champion who wields divine magic in service of a higher power
Cleric.Armor and Weapon Proficiencies: Light and medium armor, shields, simple weapons

Druid.description: A priest of the Old Faith, wielding the powers of nature — moonlight and plant growth, fire and lightning — and adopting animal forms
Druid.Armor and Weapon Proficiencies: Light and medium armor (nonmetal), shields (nonmetal), clubs, daggers, darts, javelins, maces, quarterstaffs, scimitars, sickles, slings, spears
Druid.skills: 2, Arcana, Animal Handling, Insight, Medicine, Nature, Perception, Religion, Survival

Fighter.description: A master of martial combat, skilled with a variety of weapons and armor
Fighter.Armor and Weapon Proficiencies: All armor, shields, simple and martial weapons
Fighter.skills: 2, Acrobatics, Animal Handling, Athletics, History, Insight, Intimidation, Perception, Survival

Monk.description: A master of martial arts, harnessing the power of the body in pursuit of physical and spiritual perfection
Monk.skills: 2,  Acrobatics, Athletics, History, Insight, Religion, Stealth

Paladin.description: A holy warrior bound to a sacred oath
Paladin.Armor and Weapon Proficiencies: All armor, shields, simple and martial weapons
Paladin.skills: 2, Athletics, Insight, Intimidation, Medicine, Persuasion, Religion

Ranger.description: A warrior who uses martial prowess and nature magic to combat threats on the edges of civilization
Ranger.Armor and Weapon Proficiencies: Light and medium armor, shields, simple and martial weapons
Ranger.skills: 3, Animal Handling, Athletics, Insight, Investigation, Nature, Perception, Stealth, Survival

Rogue.description: A scoundrel who uses stealth and trickery to overcome obstacles and enemies
Rogue.Armor and Weapon Proficiencies: Light armor, simple weapons, hand crossbows, longswords, rapiers, shortswords
Rogue.skills: 4, Acrobatics, Athletics, Deception, Insight, Intimidation, Investigation, Perception, Performance, Persuasion, Sleight of Hand, Stealth

Sorcerer.description: A spellcaster who draws on inherent magic from a gift or bloodline
Sorcerer.Armor and Weapon Proficiencies: Daggers, darts, slings, quarterstaffs, light crossbows
Sorcerer.skills: 2, Arcana, Deception, Insight, Intimidation, Persuasion, Religion

Warlock.description: A wielder of magic that is derived from a bargain with an extraplanar entity
Warlock.skills: 2, Arcana, Deception, History, Intimidation, Investigation, Nature, Religion

Wizard.description: A scholarly magic-user capable of manipulating the structures of reality
Wizard.Armor and Weapon Proficiencies: Daggers, darts, slings, quarterstaffs, light crossbows
Wizard.skills: 2, Arcana, History, Insight, Investigation, Medicine, Religion
